name: Boy Lay Bear
description:
PROOF OF CONCEPT Story

" Billy is my best friend. We've always been side-by-side, but I've been alone for some time now, ever since Billy fell and hit his head. 

I wonder what Billy is doing? "

Atmosphere - Emotive - Mystery

This project was created during a 4-5 week game development exercise.Average playtime is 1-5 minutes.
